ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/HaringPro/Revelation
ns0:entry.ns0:content: An explorative shaderpack for Minecraft: Java Edition

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/KhronosGroup/SPIRV-Cross
ns0:entry.ns0:content: SPIRV-Cross is a practical tool and library for performing reflection on SPIR-V and disassembling SPIR-V back to high level languages.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Open4Es/Open4Es-Shader-Android
ns0:entry.ns0:content: This is a shader can running on Minecraft Java Edition For Phone project which uses GL4ES. This repository contains source code for Android platform.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/SaschaWillems/Vulkan
ns0:entry.ns0:content: C++ examples for the Vulkan graphics API

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/X0nk/Bliss-Shader
ns0:entry.ns0:content: A minecraft shader which is an edit of chocapic v9

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/cizia64/CrossMix-OS
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Enhanced OS for the TrimUI Smart Pro

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/hackr-sh/ghostty-shaders
ns0:entry.ns0:content: A repository containing many free shaders to use with ghostty (the terminal)

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/libretro/glsl-shaders
ns0:entry.ns0:content: This repo is for glsl shaders converted by hand from libretro's common-shaders repo, since some don't play nicely with the cg2glsl script.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/patriciogonzalezvivo/lygia
ns0:entry.ns0:content: LYGIA, it's a granular and multi-language (GLSL, HLSL, Metal, WGSL, WEGL and CUDA) shader library designed for performance and flexibility

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/patriciogonzalezvivo/thebookofshaders
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Step-by-step guide through the abstract and complex universe of Fragment Shaders.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/sixthsurge/photon
ns0:entry.ns0:content: A gameplay-focused shader pack for Minecraft
